title: Enhancing Workflow Efficiency
body: Resolved order fulfillment delays by identifying coordination bottlenecks between sales, warehousing, and logistics. Results: 16% faster fulfillment, 22% less internal email, and 18% better on-time delivery.

title: Optimizing Patient and Payer Strategy
body: Implemented a data-driven healthcare framework for operational improvements and insurance negotiations, increasing patient visits by 17% and payer reimbursements by 9%.

title: Driving Customer Acquisition
body: Helped an HVAC provider enter new markets by analyzing sales data and optimizing lead targeting based on seasonal demand. Results: 2.7x increase in qualified leads and $400K+ in new contracts.

title: Improving Retention for an E-Commerce Client
body: Addressed declining customer retention with a personalization strategy that prioritized customer segments and tailored content, resulting in 36% more repeat purchases and 17% better overall retention.

title: Transforming Customer Experience
body: Helped a retailer address a 15% decline in customer experience by implementing an integrated digital journey, improving satisfaction by 22% within six months.
